triples.name: Epistasis
triples.relevance: Epistasis is the central genetic phenomenon reviewed in the paper, where mutation effects depend on genetic background.

triples.name: Fitness landscape
triples.relevance: Fitness landscapes are the primary theoretical framework discussed for understanding how genotypes map to fitness and how epistasis affects evolution.

triples.name: Adaptation
triples.relevance: The paper reviews how epistasis and fitness landscapes influence the adaptive process during evolution.

triples.name: Mutation
triples.relevance: Mutations are fundamental to the paper's discussion of epistasis, as epistasis describes when the effect of a mutation depends on genetic background.

triples.name: Genotype
triples.relevance: Fitness landscapes map genotypes to fitness, making genotype a key concept for understanding epistasis and evolution.

triples.name: Phenotype
triples.relevance: Fitness landscapes can map phenotypes to fitness, and epistasis affects phenotypic variation in populations.

triples.name: Evolution
triples.relevance: The paper reviews how epistasis and fitness landscapes shape the course and outcome of evolution.
